name: Azure Blob Block アップロード
description: BlockBlobClientで文字列をアップロード（簡易）。

files.template:
const { BlobServiceClient } = require('@azure/storage-blob');
(async () => { const bsc = BlobServiceClient.fromConnectionString(process.env.AZURE_STORAGE_CONNECTION_STRING||''); const container = bsc.getContainerClient('{{container}}'); await container.createIfNotExists(); const block = container.getBlockBlobClient('{{blob}}'); await block.upload('hello', 5); console.log('uploaded'); })();
